name: Ascension from Beneath the Abyss
description:
A LÖVE game for the BaconGameJam 09 themed "depth". An experiment in darkness, light and patience. Can you ascend from beneath the Abyss?

This game is released under the GNU General Public License version 3. The source code is available at https://bitbucket.org/ltpour/ascension-from-beneath-the-abyss.
